bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum disc, fully manipulated tubing with smooth welds, 1-1/8" lower bearing, rack and fender fittings

components.description: Specialized Tricross aluminum disc fork, alloy steerer and crown for 1-1/8" bearing, low-rider & fender fittings
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized CX Comp, 6061 alloy, shallow bend
Specialized Tricross microfiber wrap w/Body Geometry 2.5 gel pads
Nylon flat test ride, loose-ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Borough CX Armadillo Elite, 120TPI, aramid bead, 700x32c

Body Geometry Riva Plus, Cr-Mo rails, 155mm
